subject: $269.90 Suite 3 Design
body:
Aptitude found in the understanding and is often inherited. Genius coming from reason and imagination, rarely.
In argument similes are like songs in love they describe much, but prove nothing.
To love one that is great, is almost to be great one's self.
The brave don't live forever, but the cautious don't live at all. Here's to the brave!
Boredom is always counter-revolutionary. Always.
Read nothing that you do not care to remember, and remember nothing you do not mean to use.
Beware of one who has nothing to lose.
Childhood is a disease -- a sickness that you grow out of.
What we are doing at the moment is more that just one thing added to the rest it is a memoir.
That which we obtain too easily, we esteem too lightly.
Beware of one who has nothing to lose.
Every blade of grass has its angel that bends over it and whispers, grow, grow.
When people are bored it is primarily with themselves.
I thought how unpleasant it is to be locked out and I thought how it is worse, perhaps, to be locked in.
You learn from a conglomeration of the incredible past -- whatever experience gotten in any way whatsoever.
That which has been believed by everyone, always and everywhere, has every chance of being false.
Wherever man goes to dwell his character goes with him.
They that sow in tears shall reap joy. [Psalms 126:5]
A critic is a man who knows the way, but can't drive the car.
